23.textMFS: <VL<T'Construct a segment and its perpendicular bisector. '><T'Construct a segment from one end of the first segment to a point on the perpendicular bisector.'><T'Construct a segment from the other end of the first segment to the same point on the bisector.'><T'Measure these last two segments; what do you notice about the measurements?'><T'Use what you know about the reflect function to explain why this result must be true.'>>
